patterns.title: Prohibit bitwise operators
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of bitwise operators such as ^ (XOR), (OR) and others

patterns.title: Enforce camel case
patterns.description: Requires all variable names to use either camelCase style or UPPER_CASE with underscores

patterns.title: Enforce curly braces
patterns.description: Requires curly braces around blocks in loops and conditionals

patterns.title: Enforce ===
patterns.description: Requires the use of === and !== instead of == and !=

patterns.title: Enforce hasOwnProperty in loops
patterns.description: Requires the filter of inherited properties of an object when you use the for in loop

patterns.title: Prohibit native prototype overwriting
patterns.description: Prohibits overwriting prototypes of native objects such as Array, Date and so on

patterns.title: Enforce parentheses in function calls
patterns.description: Requires the use of parentheses in immediate function invocations

patterns.title: Enforce variable def before use
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of a variable before it was defined.

parameters.name: latedef
parameters.description: Declaration order verification. Check all [true] | Do not check functions [nofunc]

patterns.title: Enforce capitalized constructor
patterns.description: Requires capitalization of names of constructor functions

patterns.title: Prohibit arguments.caller and arguments.callee
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of arguments.caller and arguments.callee

patterns.title: Prohibit constructor functions
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of constructor functions for side-effects

patterns.title: Prohibit ++ and --
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of unary increment and decrement operators

patterns.title: Enforce quotation marks
patterns.description: Requires consistency of quotation marks used

patterns.title: Prohibit undeclared variables
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of explicitly undeclared variables

patterns.title: Prohibit unused variables
patterns.description: Prohibits defining and never use variables

parameters.name: unused
parameters.description: only check for variables [vars] | also check parameters [strict] | default [true] allow unused parameters followed by used

patterns.title: Excessive line length
patterns.description: Requires every line to have a limit of characters

parameters.name: maxlen
parameters.description: Reporting threshold for the number of characters per line

patterns.title: Indentation
patterns.description: Requires consistent indentation

patterns.title: Prohibit trailing whitespaces
patterns.description: Prohibits trailing whitespaces which can cause problems with multi-line strings

patterns.title: Enforce number of function parameters
patterns.description: Requires functions to have a limit of formal parameters

parameters.name: maxparams
parameters.description: Reporting threshold for the number of parameters allowed per function

patterns.title: Enforce block max depth
patterns.description: Require all blocks to have a max depth

parameters.name: maxdepth
parameters.description: Reporting threshold for the max depth

patterns.title: Excessive statements
patterns.description: Requires all functions to have a limit of its statements

parameters.name: maxstatements
parameters.description: Reporting threshold for the number of statements per function

patterns.title: Cyclomatic complexity
patterns.description: Requires code to have low cyclomatic complexity

parameters.name: maxcomplexity
parameters.description: Reporting threshold for cyclomatic complexity per function

patterns.title: Enforce semicolon use
patterns.description: Requires each line to end in a semicolon

patterns.title: Prohibit assignments in comparisons
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of assignments in cases where comparisons are expected

patterns.title: Prohibit debugger statements
patterns.description: Prohibits debugger statements

patterns.title: Prohibit == null comparisons
patterns.description: Prohibits == null comparisons

patterns.title: Prohibit eval
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of eval for security and performance reasons

patterns.title: Prohibit unusually placed expressions
patterns.description: Prohibits use of expressions where normally you would expect to see assignments or function calls

patterns.title: Prohibit variables used out of scope
patterns.description: Prohibits declaring variables inside of control structures while accessing them later from the outside

patterns.title: Prohibit __iterator__ property
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of __iterator__ property due to compatibility issues

patterns.title: Prohibit function def inside loops
patterns.description: Prohibits the definition of function inside the body of loops

patterns.title: Prohibit multi line strings
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of multi line strings due to whitespace error-proning

patterns.title: Prohibit invalid typeof operators
patterns.description: Prohibits  invalid typeof operator values

patterns.title: Prohibit variable shadowing
patterns.description: Prohibits the declaration of a variable that had been already declared somewhere in the outer scope.

patterns.title: Prohibit __proto__ property
patterns.description: Prohibits the use of __proto__ property

patterns.title: Prohibit [] notation
patterns.description: Prohibit [] notation when it can be expressed in dot notation
